[size=10pt][u][b]Acer[/b][/u][/size] Avatar is a unique 317 based, It is a 317 with higher revisions and map. There are many features such as, unique training, unique skilling areas, and the amazing Loyalt Point Shop, Voting and PvM Reward Systems. We offer 25 working skills, Minigame, Amazing Shops, Completionist Cape, Free to Play!
[size=10pt][u][b]Some Features of our server:[/b][/u][/size] - 25/7 Uptime No Lag - Team Dungeoneering - Duo Slayer - Daily Updates - Full Summoning - Hosted Dedicated Servers - Complete Clan Chat [Ranks, Loot Share] - Full Screen - All 25 Skills - Kiln Minigame - Customizeable Client - Falador Party Room - Dicing - Flower Poker - Loyalty Titles - Perfect Pking System - Perfect Switching - Curses - Prestige - Prestige Shop - Squeal of Fortune - Pest Control
